definition: sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: It's got three extra tracks and the order's slightly different.
sentences.chinese: 有三条额外的音轨而且顺序方面有点不同。

sentences.english: If you only want multiple audio tracks you can go directly to step2.
sentences.chinese: 假如你只想制作多音轨，请直接参阅步骤二。

sentences.english: One thing that still doesn't fit right is the de duration of the track.
sentences.chinese: 一个尚不能正确工作的事情是音轨的时长。

sentences.english: In other words, it gives the buffered part of the track.
sentences.chinese: 那就是说，它处理的是缓存部分的音轨。

sentences.english: For sequenced sources, just transpose the track up a fifth.
sentences.chinese: 为了达到有序的音源，只要将音轨升到第五音即可。

sentences.english: Karazhan has 14 new soundtracks for different parts of the dungeon.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉赞现在根据区域的不同，加入了14首新的音轨。

sentences.english: Msgid Can I play a track while recording a new one on top of it ?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在某个音轨正在录音时播放它吗？

sentences.english: There are audio related problems on some games that make use of CDDA tracks.
sentences.chinese: 在某些使用CD音轨的游戏中存在声音问题。

sentences.english: Reverbs can provide a nice ambiance to a track that otherwise lacks it.
sentences.chinese: 混响能为音轨营造很美妙的空间感。

sentences.english: This can really tighten up the tracks and add life to the mix.
sentences.chinese: 这就紧密地加强了音轨，增强了混音器的活力。

sentences.english: It uses cyan dye , which is environmentally friendly, to create the audio track .
sentences.chinese: 这一技术使用对环境无害的蓝绿色的染料来制造音轨。

sentences.english: On vinyl, it's four tracks each on four sides.
sentences.chinese: 黑胶唱片的每一面都有四条音轨。

sentences.english: Some coordinate the time axis to ensure Chinese subtitles synchronize with the soundtracks.
sentences.chinese: 一些成员调整时间轴，确保中文字幕与音轨同步。

sentences.english: Replace, or augment, camera audio with new support for multiple audio tracks .
sentences.chinese: 代替，或增加，以支持多音轨音频新相机。

sentences.english: Playr can handle the needs for anything from a single track or a loop to a full-feature music player.
sentences.chinese: 它能处理任意的需求，从单一音轨到全功能播放器。

definition: (computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
